description:
Splashtop Remote Desktop HD is on SALE for Limited Time! (Regular price is $19.99) 
We are celebrating Splashtop Remote Desktop HD voted by webOS Nation readers as "Best webOS Tablet App" and "Best webOS Business/Finance App" of 2011!!!
Go everywhere with your HP TouchPad and have full access to your PC or MAC!!
This is the ONLY remote desktop app that streams video and audio from your PC or Mac, allowing you to interact with your PowerPoint, Keynote, Word, Excel, Outlook, Quicken, IE, Firefox, Safari and other PC / Mac applications.
Besides HP TouchPad, Splashtop Remote Desktop is also available on webOS phones, iPad / iPhone / iPod / Mac, Android tablets and phones, and Windows PCs. Remote access your PC or MAC from any device! 
Access your PC or MAC programs, games, multimedia content, and files over Wi-Fi and 3G/4G networks. Go everywhere with just your HP TouchPad without having to carry your computer!

* Access your PowerPoint and Keynote with full animations and sound
* Access your Excel and Word applications with 100% compatibility
* Watch Flash videos (Hulu, AOL Video, Yahoo Video, etc.), Netflix, DVDs, Media Center
* Listen to music in any format on your computer (WMV, Real, WMA, MP3, AAC, etc.)
* Access your Quicken, iPhoto, and other computer programs not available for webOS

Fast and Easy Setup:

* One-click access to your computer desktop with minimal setup
* Install the free Splashtop Streamer on your computer - supports Windows 7, Vista, and XP (including Home Premium), as well as Mac OS X 10.6+ (Snow Leopard or Lion is required for Mac users)
* Application automatically finds your local computers -- sign in to your Gmail account on the app and Streamer to find your computers across the Internet
* A computer with dual-core CPU strongly recommended for best performance
